website_summaries.verdict: Monitors for up to 2 hours straight with 2-way audio functionality.
pros: Keep track of kids, elderly parents, or even an empty house with this WiFi-enabled bot
Control via an application that's intuitive to set up for those with some tech savvy
We love that this bot can operate on all kinds of surfaces
cons: Runs on the noisy side, which may distract from its purpose

customer_reviews.title: Battery will die just over a year old and you can’t buy one like it.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product. The battery will die just over a year ov owning it. I have tried to conact customer support and it simply does not exist. The 3.6v 2600a battery in it holds a proprietary circuit board in the battery casing and you can’t get this battery. A friend and I bought these at the same time and we are both in the same boat. Before you buy it try to reach any type of support.
customer_reviews.author: R User

customer_reviews.title: Great in Theory
customer_reviews.text: This is great in theory but I returned mine, the tech is just not fully ready yet. My charge base wouldn’t dock my Riley, and the charge base had a glitch and would over charge my Riley to the point that the battery life was terrible. And I had to reset it every time because of the charge. The customer service was great they called me personally and trouble shoot all my issues, but in the end, it just wasn’t worth the effort and I will wait for tech to catch up
customer_reviews.author: Terrones Family

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review. Has some great features, some weak ones. Tech support was great until...
customer_reviews.text: The little robot is fun to use and has a great picture if in a very well lit area. Otherwise, the night vision works well for black and white viewing. However, I have had multiple failures, but with quick resolution with tech support UNTIL I updated my Android phone to the 10 series. The app will not complete the connection on that system. I have been waiting in excess of 3 weeks for a resolution. Update: now a month with no solution.
customer_reviews.author: Maj C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great devices for the short period they work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these, 1 for each floor of our house. They worked great up front. I really liked them. Less than a year later, all 3 are now dead. They started failing about a month apart. If one died, I could live with that, but not all 3 of them in such a short period of time. I would strongly caution anyone thinking about purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: ST Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these robots, one in March 2019 and, because the first one worked so well, one in May 2019. The robots are great for anyone who wants to monitor their home while they're away. I even used mine in the garden to scope out a yellow-jacket's nest. In any event, in the beginning of December 2019, the one purchased in March died. It seems like the battery just stopped charging. I contacted customer support, was told to respond to an email, and they would send me a box to return the bot to them. January 12, no box. January 13, called them again, but this time had to leave a VM message. No return call.
customer_reviews.author: Learned a lesson

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced kid's toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use for security surveillance. When set for motion detect it will only record 5 events of 10 seconds only per event. It will not save or download any motion detect video for future viewing. It will not record video to your cell phone or tablet except in manual record mode. It should record motion events to phone or tablet then it would be useful for home surveillance. A longer battery life in standby mode is greatly needed 4 hours is not nearly enough. It's nothing more than an overpriced kids toy.....save your money folks it ain't worth it.....Have a nice day
